title: School Prospectus School of Accountancy, Management, Computing, and Information Studies (SAMCIS)

school.name: School of Accountancy, Management, Computing, and Information Studies (SAMCIS)
school.campus: Maryheights Campus, Bakakeng, 2600 Baguio City, Philippines

merged_from: School of Accountancy and Business Management (formerly College of Commerce, one of the original schools of Saint Louis College)
School of Computing and Information Sciences

vision_mission.vision: Envisioned as a center of excellence in Business, Management, and Information Technology Education.
vision_mission.mission: Committed to the creative, competent, and Christian formation of individuals, producing agents of progress in local and international business and IT environments.

goals_and_objectives: Develop business and ICT professionals grounded in Christian values, acting as responsible, ethical professionals and global citizens.
Innovate academic programs that are responsive to industry and community needs.
Equip faculty and students with globally competitive knowledge and skills in management and computing.
Generate relevant management and ICT research.
Provide continuing education, expert advice, and community engagement in management and ICT.
Sustain long-term growth through creative and self-reliant strategies.
program_offerings: Bachelor of Science in Management Accounting
Bachelor of Science in Business Administration, major in Financial Management (with specialization in Business Analytics)
Bachelor of Science in Business Administration, major in Marketing Management (with specialization in Business Analytics)
Bachelor of Science in Entrepreneurship (with specialization in Business Analytics)
Bachelor of Science in Tourism Management
Bachelor of Science in Hospitality Management
Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
Bachelor of Science in Information Technology
school.admission_info: General admission requirements and enrollment details are available on the SLU website or by contacting the SAMCIS office.
school.student_organizations: Please visit the SLU SAMCIS Facebook Page for a full list of accredited student organizations and co-curricular groups.
